name: Firdous
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May god give you all the reasons to be Happy and lots of your fav food ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Many many happy blah..blah.
text2: That's what everyone is going to do.
text3: But I won't. (I did it anyway)
text4: BUT I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Okay, now tell me if you liked it or not.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
